lender.name: Outsource Marketing
lender.loan_because: It's the responsible thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: We preach, teach and practice responsible marketing, for ourselves and for our clients.

lender.name: Hallgeir
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference

lender.name: Anupam
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in places that I don't travel to, but my money can!
lender.occupational_info: To improve lives and build confidence towards the future!

lender.name: Xuan Huy
lender.loan_because: micro-loans are one of the most efficient tools for development
lender.occupational_info: mostly boring, but there is always the end of a week

lender.name: Deuce
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and because its my duty to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Hectic at times

lender.name: Gibson
lender.loan_because: I want to see the world unite.

lender.name: Whitney
lender.loan_because: i want to give what i can to people who need it more than i do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a junior in high school. or grade 11.

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: I think the idea of KIVA is just brilliant.

lender.name: Bill and Missy
lender.loan_because: We want to help others achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to be broke, and I have been helped myself by people who "paid it forward."
lender.occupational_info: I help people create or build their own businesses through referral marketing, by becoming "Senders of Cards"

lender.name: Aurelien
lender.loan_because: i want to help as i can . . . .

lender.name: Miguel
lender.loan_because: if the roles were reversed, I'd like someone to help me out

lender.name: Maatia
lender.loan_because: it gives someone the chance to make their life worth the amount of work the put into it. People deserve to have a chance.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: It gives credit to people who would otherwise not be able to get it. People keep their respect, this is not a hand out, they are responsible for their own financial well-being.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying political science, in hopes that I can make a difference for good in the future.

lender.name: Kakbank
lender.loan_because: We like the idea

lender.name: MAJID
lender.loan_because: Lack of money should not kill a good idea. I would like to provide loans for training and skills development.
lender.occupational_info: I help organizations and individuals build new capabilities or improve those they already have.

lender.name: Extended Mons Family
lender.loan_because: It's easy and meaningful. Fast turnover

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I love Jesus. and He calls to serve. And I want to serve as best I can.
lender.occupational_info: I write and act in plays that are performed for audiences. I also love to dance, sing and paint and am currently taking classes for low-flying trapeze.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I want to bring the comfort of hope to others.
lender.occupational_info: Computer Programming, Administration, and Research.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I believe those of us with access to capital should share with others. The inequality woven into our global markets is stifling, and Kiva is one way to work for change.

lender.name: Jenna
lender.loan_because: The Lord has blessed me with way more than I have ever needed, and I want this river of blessing and joy to flow through me to those who need it. "Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more." (Luke 12:48)

lender.name: Serena
lender.loan_because: I believe in entreprenuership, small businesses. For them to be successful, reasonable capital support is the key.
lender.occupational_info: I help new businesses to start, exisiting businesses to flourish in the market place.

lender.name: Anna and Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: given as a gift good cause

lender.name: Antonio
lender.loan_because: I am able to help and I enjoy bringing hope for a better day to everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I design the wires inside computer chips.

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help others to help themselves. I like the efficiency of lending compared to donating as it allows the $ to be relent to another person once it is repaid

lender.name: Mil
lender.loan_because: this was originally a gift from a family member - what a great idea! I am now passing on this gift to someone in Africa, a place I visited in September 2008.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: It's affirming to participate and help others grow and prosper.

lender.name: Ginger
lender.loan_because: It allows me to help someone working to better their life.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.occupation: VP, Student Ambassadors of the World, UPenn

lender.name: Migo
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. Nuff said.

lender.name: Virgie Bartlett-Wells
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I design and sew clothing for children and women.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I want to give others a chance.

lender.name: Suzanne & Family
lender.loan_because: To help those less fortunate than me.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: I like the personal way I can help people directly.
lender.occupational_info: I work part time in an office and work full time for my family.

lender.name: Leesa
lender.loan_because: It is a small thing to do to help those who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Ensure social justice and empower people to help themselves.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people who want to work to achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I organize, negotiate and build tools to allow my team to complete their projects as efficiently as possible.

lender.name: Jennifer E.
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Intel, in IT.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I believe we are all unique, talented & beautiful individuals that are all part of a greater whole. And to help one, is to help all.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I feel it is my responsibility to share my good fortune with others, that they may also prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Fire Protection Engineer. My job is to make sure buildings and the people that are in them are safe from the dangers of fire.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I can. Plus, hard working people remind me of some people I know.

lender.name: Alicia Adams
lender.occupational_info: I laugh a lot. Being around people makes me really happy. I've run four marathons. I wear lipstick. My belongings like to hide from me. I have this constant paranoia that gravity is out to get me. I love animals, especially dogs and horses. I'm constantly on the look-out for climbable trees, rideable mountains, and hair-blowing wind. I love to run with good music. I'm a desert girl that loves her sun and mountains. I wasn't born in Texas, but "I got here as fast as I could!" I tend to read instructions as a last resort. And I love to look for God in the little things.

lender.name: Angelica
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to achieve their goals and become succesful at what they do.

lender.name: Patience
lender.loan_because: of love.

lender.name: Miranda
lender.loan_because: They aren't stealing money...they work hard and the pay back as soon as possibel and I see this as a positive company and I see no reason why you shouldn't help out!
lender.occupational_info: I am A Highschool Student. I want to a journalist when I grow up or maybe a criminal investigator. I'm not really sure yet!

lender.name: Brittany
lender.loan_because: "We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give." ~ Sir Winston Churchill I was "gifted" a Kiva certificate for Christmas in 2009. The symbolic nature of this gift was incredible! I commend all the loan recipients for pursuing a dream and am honored to be able to assist in turning those dreams into reality!!! There are truly inspirational individuals in this world, thank you for being you!

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I admire people who run their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office where we keep track of offenders convicted of sex crimes.

lender.name: Hughes-Watkins Family
lender.loan_because: how can you not? its so easy and it helps so much.
lender.occupational_info: we sell vintage clothing. one of us is an advertising writer and our baby is a full time crawler.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I can make a little difference for the world.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: These people are not looking for a handout. They are looking for a helping hand. Relatively small amounts of capital can make such a difference in someone's life
lender.occupational_info: I love owning my own business (with my brother). It's hard work but I love it!

lender.name: Madan
lender.occupational_info: I am a tour operator in Nepal. I have created Mount Meru Treks for the same puropse. When People From different corners of the world contact me I will Provide them with information about tour in Nepal and other program about nepal.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to have a vision and lack resources. I love feeling connected to others around the world. I believe we are all brothers and sisters on earth and when we help eachother we create a beautiful world where anything is possible.
lender.occupational_info: I paint on canvas & also paper with pen and ink, some collage. I also like to design and sell jewelry.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.occupational_info: I work on a computer all day where I build webpages for a university.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: "We're just happy to be doing good works." On a personal note: Since my path crossed and subsequently diverged with that of a Vietnamese gal (nicest person I ever met and a joy to work with), I've spent the past few years searching for a subtle way to honor her memory and pass along some of the karma I enjoyed from knowing her for a short while. It seems I finally found a way through Kiva.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I like to help people and I like for people to have better lives

lender.name: Mandy
lender.loan_because: I have enough for myself and my family and I like the idea that I can help some one further their financial independence. I think this is better than charity.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to set up a loan to purchase a house.

lender.name: Yuka
lender.loan_because: I have small shop in Japan. I want to help someone who want to start own business. I loan small money from sales of the shop.

lender.name: artedetimo
lender.loan_because: Original moneys were gifted to me, but its a creative way to remember to not be evil.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a photographer and I make web pages.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great program.
lender.occupational_info: I am a TV writer in Los Angeles, California.

lender.name: Mallory
lender.occupational_info: I work at Starbucks (coffee retail). In school I study writing and biology.

lender.name: Ben McKay
lender.loan_because:
I've been fortunate enough to have had a great career to date in search marketing, and after being recommended by SEO Book, I thought it was exactly the kind of way of helping that I would like to get involved in.
And having travelled and worked in South East Asia, this is a part of the world that is a bit of a soft-spot for me.
lender.occupational_info: I work to in online marketing in Manchester and Cheshire in the UK. More specifically I help websites get more visitors by improving their visibility in the search engines...a practice called SEO, or search engine optimisation.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Avantless
lender.loan_because: We embrace change and those that propose possibilities to do so in their zone of influence
lender.occupational_info: We are advisers to organizations in business management in the tourism sector

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: Anyone willing to have a go deserves a chance.

lender.name: Rashel
lender.loan_because: I believe sustainable progress in the development field depends on empowerment at the grassroots.

lender.name: Konrads, Janet & Thomas
lender.loan_because: Do unto others as you would have them do unto you.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: money's made round to go round

lender.name: Beau Gunderson
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy!
lender.occupational_info: I travel and take pictures.

lender.name: Allan
lender.loan_because: At some time we all need help.

lender.name: carsale24
lender.occupation: Carsale24 is Europe‚Äòs new way of selling cars
lender.loan_because: We can!
lender.occupational_info: Carsale24 creates via an independent third partie expert reviews for every car. Those expert reviews replace the standard insertions which usually are made by the car seller and avoid untold flaws and unpleasant surprises for used car dealers. Dealers can place bids and buy the car via carsale24. Carsale24 solves problems of both parties, buyer and seller. Used car dealers get an attractive new channel for used cars with expert reports. Sellers can avoid tedious labour and are offered a fast, comfortable and secure way to sell their cars.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: it changes lives!

lender.name: Malinda
lender.loan_because: I know that everyone needs a hand some time. One of the most powerful things that has ever happened in my life was when someone who I didn't know read my story and wanted to help me.
lender.occupational_info: I am managing a project to improve access to government financial support for carers of children who have significant disabilities.in Australia.

lender.name: Philipp
lender.loan_because: I believe microcredits are the tool for empowerment. It allows people to raise the livingstandards of their families out of with their own sense for enterpreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I am manager in a software company. The company does provide a mobile phone GPS-navigation solution

lender.name: Tim & Catie
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference
lender.occupational_info:
Tim helps companies provide pensions to their employees.
Catie is a homeopath providing alternative healthcare to local people.

lender.name: Machelle
lender.loan_because: Global stability depends on global equality.
lender.occupational_info: I teach statistics to university students and develop statistical methods for environmental and social science data.

lender.name: Maya
lender.loan_because: so I can help

lender.name: Duncan Lock
lender.loan_because: I want Codeistry, my small business, to do some good and connect to other small businesses around the world via microfinancing.
lender.occupational_info: I make websites and help people with their computer and internet problems.

lender.name: cecilia
lender.loan_because: I have been so richly blessed.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: everyday at work ,where we feed the less fortunate, I am reminded how fortunate I am. Having the opportunity to contribute funds to help empower others is an awesome gift for which I am grateful.
lender.occupational_info: Everyday I (and many volunteers) cook and serve healthy delicious meals to the less fortunate people in our community. It is the most rewarding job I have ever had!

lender.name: Eric
lender.occupation: founder of a energy consulting company

lender.name: Stef.
lender.loan_because: I want to share.
lender.occupational_info: Education and childcare, previously. Accountancy, now.

lender.name: Annelies
lender.loan_because: it is a good way to help people
lender.occupational_info: I am a mum and a grandmother that is what keeps me occupied. and i work as a volunteer in a shop.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: it's better than spending money on premium coffee.

lender.name: Michael Borell
lender.loan_because: I think it is amazing for me to be able to loan to people across the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a nurse in a nursing home for the elderly.

lender.name: KIM
lender.loan_because: TO HELP PEOPOLE WHO HAVE LESS THEN ME

lender.name: Lars
lender.loan_because: In hope for a better life for people
lender.occupational_info: Services for companies in need of development. (Sweden)

lender.occupational_info: I work with organizations to help them accomplish things on time, within budget, and at the level of quality expected

lender.name: Irene
lender.occupation: Sr Business Intelligence and DW Developer
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Techy

lender.name: Mikee
lender.loan_because: I think this is a very important initiative and I'm glad to be able to support it and the people who are funded.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer for the Austrian-Mongolian Friendship Society and I own a small Internet business.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to empower others to improve their quality of life and to help their families and communities thrive.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate free surgeries for people without health insurance, by using volunteer hospitals, doctors, and nurses.

lender.name: Isaac
lender.occupational_info: Renewable resource engineering

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: ...ultimately, we are all interdependent.
lender.occupational_info: I am a political geographer, with specific interests in geopolitics, international security, development, identity studies, and sustainability.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Everyone in the world needs a chance to build something up. It¬¥s up to us, the "wealthy" and "affluent", but also well educated Western civilisation. I hope that with my loan somebody can make his dreams come true!
lender.occupational_info: I¬¥m selling electricity ;)

lender.name: Damian Shenko
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women throughout the world to improve their lives.

lender.name: Andrea & Ron
lender.loan_because: We know how many small gifts can give a person that lift they need to go on and thrive.
lender.occupational_info: Andrea & Ron work on computers and the Internet, building websites for people to have an online voice, a place to write where others can read wherever they are, or to sell their products or services.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: I'm very fortunate, but most are not. With Kiva I actually know who I'm donating too, and that it is a real help to someone.
lender.occupational_info: I help decide how brands spend their advertising dollars.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Trent
lender.loan_because: I have been extremeley fortunate in my life and I am trying to spread some of the wealth I have received to those people who need it more than I do.

lender.name: Mindy
lender.loan_because: I want to give to others that need help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital and work to help the hospital obtain payment for the services so that the hospital can stay open to help others. We attempt to help people who cannot pay for services find the most cost effective way to obtain health care.

lender.name: ginny and ron
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their dreams!

lender.name: Sal
lender.occupational_info: Leader of a primary school

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I wish to help you make the world better for everyone and everything
lender.occupational_info: My work with Kiva currently is focused on helping people start buisinesses which will make the world a better place (agriculture, health, education, etc.)

lender.name: Rob and Dan
lender.loan_because: even when times are tough for me, there are so many striving to pull themselves just a little higher. I know how hard it is to ask, but how much pride comes from repayment. But even failure teaches us great lessons.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I am the oldest of five sisters and have a small business myself designing jewelry. I have always been motivated by the power of women and incredibly blessed by all the women in my life - family, friends, teachers. I want to enable other women to power, creativity and independence. I loan as an expression of thanks to my grandmother, mother, son, daughter-in-law, sisters and all my family who make my life so rich.
lender.occupational_info: Professionally I am a marketing director for a major media company in Los Angeles, CA. It's my job to inform other businesses about our company, how it's unique and how we can help them. I also have my own business and design jewelry. I am using the money from this business to help fund other women around the world.

lender.name: Leslie Kerby
lender.loan_because: I want to help others (especially women) have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a single mother of five children. I am a student studying engineering.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I'm paying it forward
lender.occupational_info: I help people create a healthy and beautiful smile!

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It's good for the world economy

lender.name: Kalle
lender.loan_because: Because I think it is the right thing to do. One of the most direct and transparent ways to help out.

lender.name: Chrissy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people get out of the cycle of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Seattle Pacific University in my fourth year. I am studying psychology and would like to do social work and counseling with children. I also nanny for young children. I am passionate about social justice in the world.

lender.name: Henning
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepeneurship as the far best way to achieve one's personal aims in life and want to help fellow entrepeneurs around the world to boost their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I am managing a medium sized IT company.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: After the eventual collapse of the US economy, I plan to be well diversified into the frankfurter business in Tajikistan, which many economists consider to be the next wave in world commerce. Ladies, you may join me on my yacht in 2050, where we shall drink wine and eat caviar.
lender.occupational_info: I dress in something that looks a lot like pajamas and monitor people who have heart disease and a variety of other conditions.

lender.name: Jillian
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed immensely and wish to share what I have with those less fortunate.

lender.name: Len and Kelly
lender.occupation: Social Worker and Landman in oil & gas
lender.loan_because: we care about the world. We are atheists, and want to help people who want to improve their own lives.

lender.name: Leigh
lender.loan_because: I beleive that those struggling to better conditions for themselves and their communities should be supported.
lender.occupational_info: I am very lucky to be able to do what I do.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: The things that we share in our world are far more valuable than those which divide us.

lender.name: Heavenly Hostess
lender.loan_because: I believe women have the power to change the world and sometimes they need a hand up to acheive their goals.
lender.occupational_info: Designer and business owner. I design aprons, home accessories, fashion accessories and casual clothing. I also own and operate my own boutique in California.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: My son gave me a gift certificate and it is a great cause
lender.occupational_info: Retired mother of 3

lender.name: Jacki
lender.occupational_info: I help university students who have disabilities to get their exams written.

lender.name: Kotaro
lender.occupation: an accountant for a trading company

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: My son gave me a gift certificate to start giving and it is a wonderful program to help people in need.
lender.occupational_info: Happily retired

lender.name: Peter
lender.occupational_info: Business accounting and finance

lender.name: Ram
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone here deserves every little bit of help they could get and I am in position to help.

lender.name: Jana
lender.occupational_info: I teach history.

lender.name: Zidor
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I draw stuff I guess :P

lender.name: Dan
lender.occupational_info: I make sandwiches!

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: People need a chance to improve their lives. It brings dignity and self respect to their hearts, something to be proud of. This contributes to the whole community.

lender.name: sarah
lender.occupational_info: Research genes that cause inherited eye diseases. Provide nonprofit clinical genetic testing to patients, allowing them to get one step closer to their cure

lender.name: Saab
lender.loan_because: It is important to give opportunity, to give hope, to afford others dignity earned through hard work and sacrifice
lender.occupational_info: I make sure all necessary means are available for my organization to accomplish its mission.

lender.name: Noelle
lender.loan_because: I am also an entrepreneur and appreciate the hard work, dedication and spirit it requires. I feel strongly that the best way for people to create the life they dream about is to create their own business- and that can be done anywhere in the world.
lender.occupational_info:
I help people buy and sell homes in the Los Angeles, California area- that means I help them with all the issues surrounding that, from deciding if it is the correct decision, to locating a property and negotiating the deal, to leading them through our very complicated sales process.
I was a teacher, previous to working in real estate, and hold a special place in my heart for all teachers everywhere.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: money goes bad when it doesn't have a chance to breath.
lender.occupational_info: I clean the houses of people who would rather be doing something else, of people who have spent years cleaning their own homes, but now save their energy for other things more valuable than the cost of my services.

lender.name: Linus
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. I do believe that we are each others keeper.

lender.name: FHC Pharmacy Team
lender.loan_because: We recognize the many gifts in our lives come from the generosity of others; our parents, our friends and our very generous organization. We have the desire to share our good fortune in the capacity we can with other communities.
lender.occupational_info: We are members of a hybridized program supported by charitable donations, federal grants in coordination with other payers to provide prescription medications to patients that otherwise could not afford them in our community. Health care advocacy and access is our daily mission.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I have so much and I'm so grateful for the luxuries I have living in North America and I feel it is my responsibility, as a citizen of the world, to help my fellow people, because I can.

lender.name: Coty
lender.loan_because: I too am starting a business and I know how very had it is to do without the right tools. I wish everyone in the world to be sucessful with all their positive, good will dream, goals wishes and desires. It makes me happy to know I can do a little something to help
lender.occupational_info: I design, fashion ,furniture, and interior spaces with an extreme sophistication. My work is unique, one of a kind, dramatic, fashion forward, edgy, awe inspiring one of a kind pieces. My focus on interior designed spaces is in the hospitality and retail industry where the above aformentioned characteristics are necessary to sucessfully draw in the public and for eccentric, ridiculously wealthy residential clients that want all their living spaces to be unique and stand out from their neighbours. No 2 people are alike; no 2 spaces should be alike.
